description.@en: My mind has become a nesting ground for the darkness, breeding new, terrible thoughts with each passing day. I believe this is to teach me, to make me immune to the terrors I have witnessed. But it comes with the price of exhaustion and a struggle to endure.

effect.@en: Whenever you are subjected to the effects of Stress, Fear or Terror, you gain a +10% Base Chance to use Skill Tests against its source until it goes away or is Slain!. However, the Historian may spend a Coin to force you to suffer Despair when under their effects.
